website_summaries.verdict: An award-winning eye cream that contains brightening vitamin C and banana powder to reduce the appearance of dark circles under the eyes.
pros: This lightweight cream exceeds expectations for many users
It melts easily into the skin and is very hydrating
It works well as a color corrector under concealer
Very brightening and contains collagen for plumping
cons: Causes milia (small white bumps) around the eyes of some users

customer_reviews.title: Not for everyone...
customer_reviews.text: Hello I want to give you my own personal feedback. I started to use the cream full of good expectations.. but unfortunately from the first trial my eyes and also the area besides my eyes became etchy sensative and red. I had tears throughout the day.. and the area besides my eyes became red. After several days with out using the product I tried it again. Just to understand if this was the cause for the problem. It happened again immediately. Even after I washed the cream still again for the next few days I got red around my eyes and tears and my eyes were really painfull.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Less product than advertised
customer_reviews.text: The actual product itself is really good, but under the surface layer of the cream was a giant air bubble, so it’s way less product than described 😫. It won’t last me very long because there’s mostly air in the center. Such a rip off. It’s hard to tell in the picture but there is a giant cave of air in there.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Smith

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive for what it is.
customer_reviews.text: For the price of this product I had high expectations that weren't really met. I like the smell of the product, but it is not really doing anything to change the appearance of my dark circles. I wouldn't purchase again as I find it expensive for what it does
customer_reviews.author: Mai Doineau

customer_reviews.title: Did not see a difference in dark circles or fine lines
customer_reviews.text: This eye creme made my fine lines around my eyes worse and dark circles did not become lighten. For the cost and size, I would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great eye cream, buy it at Sephora
customer_reviews.text: Overpriced here, only bought it bc it was sold out forever everywhere else and I’m impatient. It’s lovely and this is the real product (at least the one I received is, compared side to side with real product)
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Olehenriksen is the best
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased this twice and will keep doing so. It’s amazing for the morning time and light on your skin. Will buy another!!
customer_reviews.author: christina lowe

customer_reviews.title: Does not make my sensitive eyes water!
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell and texture and can even use on eyelids!
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed
customer_reviews.text: I could feel this working the first day. It's still soon, so I will attempt to update with results later. But this product is awesome. It's not a miracle worker, so manage your expectations. But it's a quality product that absorbs well into the skin and is comfortable to wear beneath your makeup. You don't need much! I use it in the morning and it makes me appear more awake and alert, smells great, and definitely brightens up the under eye area. I've only been using for a few days, but noticed a small difference very quickly. Can't wait to see how it works long-term!
customer_reviews.author: Karlee Rae

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this eye cream I had read a lot of good reviews well I don’t see any difference in bags ,dark circles and fine lines I’ve been using it for 1 month for me wouldn’t purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Terri Delgado

customer_reviews.title: Keep coming back to this one
customer_reviews.text: Did not realize how well this worked until I tried something else... after one week I bought a new jar of banana bright eye! If you have dark circles I recommend trying this it’s worked very well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Craig

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: Only got worse after using this product, don't attribute it to using this product but also did not help at all.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Brown

customer_reviews.title: I was allergic to it!
customer_reviews.text: My eyes turned red and were swollen for a few days!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical but it does exactly what it says. I’m 52 years old and my face looks refreshed and glowing
customer_reviews.author: sandra mejia

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: It smells great but didn’t help with reducing under eye darkness. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: Magic
customer_reviews.text: Made the dark circles under my eyes, significantly less dark. Good product. Little pricey though.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Jolie

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: As a new mom I had crazy dark circles. This made me look well rested! Love this product
customer_reviews.author: Amie R Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Bad product
customer_reviews.text: I think the product i got was old. Texture was not at all the same as what i saw on youtube videos.
customer_reviews.author: Reem Alabdulhadi

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Smells amazing and did brighten my eyes the day after using it! However I developed and allergic reaction to it because of the banana, and has to stop using it.
customer_reviews.author: Buse K.

customer_reviews.title: No results not worth money
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I saw no results what so ever and used it every day and saw no results
customer_reviews.author: Brianna D.

customer_reviews.title: The eyes have it
customer_reviews.text: Compared to brands purchased in department stores and independent treatment centers, this bright eye crème has value and seems to be working great. I notice a difference when I don't use it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Secouler

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not spectacular
customer_reviews.text: Really nice eye cream but no different from others I have used.
customer_reviews.author: Hayley Tenhoopen

customer_reviews.title: Sephora product better
customer_reviews.text: I purchased from Sephora after having bought from this seller, and there was a noticeable difference in quality
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Feltman

customer_reviews.title: Instant eye opener
customer_reviews.text: It’s nice to see instant results after application. Great smell too!
customer_reviews.author: AAD

customer_reviews.title: Amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for hereditary under eye bags. Amazing instant effect and more pronounced after long term use
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: does the work
customer_reviews.text: it really does brighten and soften the eyes area, I'm not sure if it's going to have a long-lasting effect but it's good for my day time use
customer_reviews.author: F

customer_reviews.title: Instant Glow
customer_reviews.text: This moisturizer gives an instant and lasting glow. It works wonders if you apply it right before make up.
customer_reviews.author: Renata Pozzobon

customer_reviews.title: Brightens and moisturizes
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It really brightens up the eyes and moisturizes. It’s pricy but worth it because it lasts a long time and does what it promises.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Denise Buitron

customer_reviews.title: hydrating
customer_reviews.text: smooth application, i havent seen much brightness yet but i still like the product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Feels very good on skin. Like it. As for long term i will see. 😊 Thank you
customer_reviews.author: anat rainer

customer_reviews.title: Really Works!
customer_reviews.text: It actually does help to hide under eye dark spots and also is a great base for concealer and for eyeshadow. Goes on smooth without pulling the skin. After trying many different products, this one really makes a difference and I use it daily with or without makeup.
customer_reviews.author: On Line Shopper

customer_reviews.title: ALLERGIC REACTION!!
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was allergies for over a month now. I finally figured out it is this product. I am not the first one to have a horrible reaction to this product. I looked at other reviews online, even on the OleHenriksen website, you can see others had the same problem. As I type, my eyelids are so swollen and red and incredibly itchy. You've been warned.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Great under eye moisturizer/brightener
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this for two weeks and I’m so happy with the results. When applied my undereyes immediately appear brighter and less purple.
customer_reviews.author: Aloha Momma

customer_reviews.title: My ride or die!!
customer_reviews.text: By far my fav product of theirs!!! This order is my backup!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn V

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased that I bought this product. Already, I can see some difference in my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Dana J.

customer_reviews.title: Great eye cream
customer_reviews.text: Very moisturizing but not too heavy. Works great under concealer. I feel like my dark circles have lightened. Smells good. I don’t think it is overpriced, I think it is worth the money. On my 2nd jar already.
customer_reviews.author: IloveVegetablesDawg

customer_reviews.title: Best eye cream ever
customer_reviews.text: Hands down one of the best I’ve tried (and boy have I tried a lot of eye creams). Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: S. Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: A good product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughter and she loves it. This is her second jar. Very gentle on her skin. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda C

customer_reviews.title: Loving the results.
customer_reviews.text: Seeing an improvement within just a few days! Will def make apart of my regular routine.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Watery
customer_reviews.text: The product was all watery and looked damaged. Box was fine
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what all the fuss is about. This was marginally effective.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Ward

customer_reviews.title: Package was open.
customer_reviews.text: Box was open. Tired of the process of sending stuff back. Will not return but will buy the product at the mall like I was doing before. There was a sticker seal but it wasn’t place to keep package closed. I have a picture for review. A
customer_reviews.author: j

product_meta.title: OLEHENRIKSEN Banana Bright Eye Crème
feature_bullets: This is the Full-Size 0.5Oz / 15 mL version
